Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: The only feedback edits I've used are the error highlights on word docs/google docs, so I'm not sure whether or not that counts as GenAl, but it was very helpful in picking up small typing errors and providing quick feedback. Feedback from the teacher is also helpful but on a deeper level/ based more on my approach to a certain point, etc.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback from my teacher helped me see how I could improve in the future so it felt more worthwhile than the GenAl error warning feedback.
